mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, total_price, address, phone, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalPrice}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT o.id as order_id, o.user_id, o.total_price, o.address, o.phone, o.status, o.create_time, oi.id as oi_id, oi.quantity as oi_quantity, oi.price as oi_price, d.id as dish_id, d.name as dish_name, d.image_url as dish_image_url FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN dishes d ON oi.dish_id = d.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
